abstract: Veteran referee Kenny Bayless is selected to oversee highly-anticipated bout between Floyd Mayweather Jr and Manny Pacquiao.
lead_paragraph: Nevada boxing commissioners picked Kenny Bayless to referee the fight and named Dave Moretti, Glenn Feldman and Burt Clements as judges.

headline.main: Fight Officials Selected for Mayweather-Pacquiao Bout

snippet: Nevada boxing commissioners picked Kenny Bayless to referee the fight and named Dave Moretti, Glenn Feldman and Burt Clements as judges.
